Value: Computes the linear correlation between two monovariate times series x and y (in Computes the window cross correlation between times series (in DataFrame format) x and y

Param_0: the maximum lag at which correlation should be computed. It is in the range [0; (self.lx+self.ly-1)/2] (in samples)
Param_1: if True the plot of correlation function is showed. Default: False
Param_2: length of the windowed signals (in samples)
Param_3: amount of time elapsed between two windows (in samples)
Param_4: amount of time elapsed between two cross-correlation (in samples)
Param_5: number of element in one second
